biotools.summary: This tutorial aims to illustrate the process of building up a command-line workflow using the BioExcel Building Blocks library (biobb). The tutorial is based on the Protein Gromacs MD Setup Jupyter Notebook tutorial.

bioschemas.name: BioExcel Building Blocks tutorials: Command-line workflows
